name: Data Escape
description:
What happens when you fail to properly lock down your data by using public WiFi, weak passwords or some other form of carelessness? It's much easier for your data to escape! Play as Data on the run with the help of a friendly program named Usivr (Virus). Travel the digital world to save your friends Socia, Casha, and Flasha from the clutches of Avi! Collect Data fragments to aid your journey out of your phone's security and into the freedom, Usivr promises!!! Even the tightest security is no match for Data and her friends!

Created by Michael Neri & Hana Khalyleh.
